Sellers and sales leaders use Wiser’s live sales assistant to receive in-depth deal insights, unified access to docs, CRMs, and conversational data, and automatically populate Salesforce and Hubspot.
Wiser’s chrome extension enables Wiser to be more easily access directly from Google Calendar.
